zh_cn.welcome_text:
欢迎你，{location} 场 {faction} 签到人员。

/importrsvp - 导入你所在阵营的特工
/checkin - 进行签到
/checkout - 进行签退
/help - 寻求帮助
zh_cn.checkin_choosefirstletter: 请选择签到 agent 的 ID 首字母。
zh_cn.checkin_error_checkedin: ⚠️ 特工 {agent} 已经完成签到。请选择一个不同的特工。
zh_cn.checkin_logdata:
请在消息框中写上 agent {agent} 目前等级、AP 和步行距离数据，以半角逗号 `,` 区隔。
例如：`16,40000000,2500`。大部分设备点击/长按示例可复制。

en_us.welcome_text:
Hello. You are {faction} organizer of {location} First Saturday.

/importrsvp - Import the list of agents same as the faction you are managing
/checkin - Check in an agent
/checkout - Check out an agent
/help - I need help
en_us.checkin_choosefirstletter: Choose the letter that at the beginning of agent name of the agent want to check in.
en_us.checkin_chooseagent: Choose the agent name of the agent want to check in.
en_us.checkin_error_checkedin: ⚠️ Agent {agent} already checked in. Choose a different agent.
en_us.checkin_logdata: Write down the level, AP and Trekker data (“Distance walked” in agent profile) of the agent {agent} in the message text field, and send it to bot. Separated with `,`, such as: `16,40000000,2500`. You can longpress or click the sample to copy it in most devices
